targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  type,
  count(1) AS "transactions",
  sum(amount) as "total amount (HE)",
   sum(tx_fee) AS "fee (BNB)"
FROM "HotWalletTransfers" where type is not null
group by type

select 'ISSUED HERO' as type,count(1) AS "transactions",sum(a.tx_fee) as "fee (BNB)" 
from (select max(tx_fee) as tx_fee 
from "TransferHeros" 
where from_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' group by tx_hash) a

SELECT
  type,
  count(1) AS "transactions",
  sum(amount) as "total amount (HE)",
   sum(tx_fee) AS "fee (BNB)"
FROM "HotWalletTransfers" where  $__timeFilter(create_time) and type is not null
group by type

select 'ISSUED HERO' as type,count(1) AS "transactions",sum(a.tx_fee) as "fee (BNB)" 
from (select max(tx_fee) as tx_fee 
from "TransferHeros" 
where from_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' and $__timeFilter(create_time) group by tx_hash) a

with data as (
  select
    date_trunc('hour', a."create_time") as time,
    sum("amount")  as "amount"
  from (select create_time,"amount" from "HotWalletTransfers" 
  where "type"  in ('SUMMON','LIMIT_BREAK','SPEND_FEE','BUY_SLOT','DEPOSIT','CLAN_MAP','EDIT_NAME','PURCHASE_ITEM_DUNGEON','REQUEST_HERO','UNION_BLESSING')) a
  group by 1
)
select
  time,
  sum("amount") over (order by time asc rows between unbounded preceding and current row) as "spend onchain" 
from data order by time;
select value::float as "he_ingame", date_trunc('hour', "createdAt") as time from "Snapshots" where key = 'PLAYFAB_HE_INGAME'   and $__timeFilter("createdAt")
select value::float as "claimed", date_trunc('hour', "createdAt") as time from "Snapshots" where key = 'HOTWALLET'   and $__timeFilter("createdAt")

SELECT
  max(create_time) AS "time",
  count(DISTINCT to_address) as total 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where to_address != '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'

with data as (
  select
    date_trunc('hour', a.create_time) as day,
    count(a.to_address) as total
  from (select to_address,min(create_time) as create_time from "TransferHeros" where to_address != '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' group by to_address) a
  group by 1 
)

select
  day as time,
  sum(total) over (order by day asc rows between unbounded preceding and current row)
from data

select count(b.to_address) as users,b.time as time from (select min(a.time) as time, a.to_address from (SELECT
  date_trunc('day',create_time) AS "time",
 to_address 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where to_address != '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' and $__timeFilter(create_time)
) a group by a.to_address) b group by b.time order by time
select count(distinct owner) as holder from "HeroV2s" hvs where not is_burned
select owner as address, count(1) as hold from "HeroV2s" hvs where not is_burned group by "owner" order by hold desc limit 50

select  owner,
tier,
token_id,
name,
case 
when tier = 'Common' then 1
when tier = 'Rare' then 2
when tier = 'Rare+' then 3
when tier = 'Epic' then 4
when tier = 'Epic+' then 5
when tier = 'Legendary' then 6
when tier = 'Legendary+' then 7
when tier = 'Immortal' then 8
when tier = 'Immortal+' then 9
when tier = 'Ultimate' then 10
when tier = 'Ultimate 1' then 11
when tier = 'Ultimate 2' then 12
when tier = 'Ultimate 3' then 13
when tier = 'Ultimate 4' then 14
when tier = 'Ultimate 5' then 15


else 20
end as tier_weight
from "HeroV2s" hvs where tier <> '' and owner <> '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'

order by  tier_weight desc   limit 50

SELECT
  date_trunc('day',NOW()) AS "time",
  count(to_address) as "Issued Heroes" 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where from_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'

SELECT
  date_trunc('day',NOW()) AS "time",
  count(to_address) as "Burned Heroes" 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where to_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'

select  name,tier, count(1) as heroes  from "HeroV2s" where name <> '' group by name,tier
order by name,tier

select  name, count(1) as heroes  from "HeroV2s" where name <> ''  group by name
 order by "heroes" desc

SELECT
  count(to_address) as "Issued Heroes" 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where from_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'  and $__timeFilter(create_time)

SELECT

  count(to_address) as "Burned Heroes" 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where to_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'  and $__timeFilter(create_time)

select count(1) as "Distinct heroes" from (select  name  from "HeroV2s" where not is_burned and name <> '' group by name
order by name) a

select class, count(1) as heroes from "HeroV2s" where not is_burned and name <> '' group by class
  order by heroes

select race, count(1) as heroes from "HeroV2s" where not is_burned and name <> '' group by race
  order by heroes

select tier, count(1) as heroes from "HeroV2s" where not is_burned and name <> '' group by tier
  order by heroes

select type , count(1) as heroes from "HeroV2s"   group by type
  order by heroes

select type_issued , count(1) as heroes from "HeroV2s" where  "type" = 'SUMMON'  group by type_issued
  order by heroes

select tier_basic , count(1) as heroes from "HeroV2s" where  "type" = 'SUMMON' and name <> ''  group by tier_basic
  order by heroes

select tier_basic , count(1) as heroes from "HeroV2s" where  "type" = 'SUMMON' and name <> '' and type_issued='Scroll'  group by tier_basic
  order by heroes

select b.type_issued,a.time,count(1) as heroes  from 
(select token_id,date_trunc('day',create_time) AS "time" from "TransferHeros" 
where from_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' and
  $__timeFilter(create_time::date) ) a,
"HeroV2s" b where a.token_id = b.token_id and b."type" = 'SUMMON' group by a.time ,b.type_issued

SELECT
  date_trunc('day',create_time) AS "time",
  count(to_address) as "issue hero" 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where from_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' and $__timeFilter(create_time)
group by time  order by time

SELECT
  date_trunc('day',create_time) AS "time",
  count(to_address) as "burned hero" 
FROM "TransferHeros"
where to_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' and $__timeFilter(create_time)
group by time  order by time

select a.time,b.tier_basic,count(1) as "heroes rare issued" from (select token_id,date_trunc('day',create_time) AS "time"
FROM "TransferHeros"
where from_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'
and $__timeFilter(create_time)) a, "HeroV2s" b where a.token_id = b.token_id and b.tier_basic = 'Rare' 
group by a.time,b.tier_basic

with data as (
  select
    date_trunc('day', create_time) as day,
   count(DISTINCT token_id) as total 
  from "TransferHeros" 
  where   from_address  = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'
  group by 1
)

select
  day as time,
  sum(total) over (order by day asc rows between unbounded preceding and current row)  as "Total issued"
from data

with data as (
  select
    date_trunc('day', create_time) as day,
   count(DISTINCT token_id) as total 
  from "TransferHeros" 
  where   to_address  = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'
  group by 1
)

select
  day as time,
  sum(total)  over (order by day asc rows between unbounded preceding and current row) as "Total burned"
from data

with data as (
  select
    date_trunc('day', create_time) as day,
   count(DISTINCT token_id) as total 
  from "TransferHeros" 
  where   from_address  = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'
  group by 1
)

select
  day as time,
  sum(total)  over (order by day asc rows between unbounded preceding and current row) as "Total issued"
from data

with data as (
  select
    date_trunc('day', create_time) as day,
   count(DISTINCT token_id) as total 
  from "TransferHeros" 
  where   to_address  = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000'
  group by 1
)

select
  day as time,
  sum(total)  over (order by day asc rows between unbounded preceding and current row) as "Total burned"
from data

select  count(*) as "Matching tx",sum(price) as "Matching volume in HE" ,sum(price) * $hePrice as "Matching volume in USD", sum(market_fee) as "Revenue in HE", sum(market_fee)* $hePrice as "Revenue in USD"   from "MatchTransactions"

select  count(*) as "Matching tx",sum(price) as "Matching volume in HE" ,sum(price) * $hePrice as "Matching volume in USD", sum(market_fee) as "Revenue in HE", sum(market_fee)* $hePrice as "Revenue in USD"   from "MatchTransactions" where $__timeFilter(create_time)

select t.count as "Issued", b.count as "Burned"  from 
(select  count(1) from "PackageNFTs" where to_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000') b,
(select  count(1)  from "PackageNFTs" where  from_address  = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000') t
select sum(a.price) as "Revenue"  from (select max(price) as price from "PackageNFTs" group by tx_hash) a

select t.count as "Issued", b.count as "Burned"  from 
(select  count(1) from "PackageNFTs" where to_address = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' and $__timeFilter(create_time)) b,
(select  count(1)  from "PackageNFTs" where  from_address  = '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' and $__timeFilter(create_time)) t
select sum(price) as "Revenue"  from "PackageNFTs" where $__timeFilter(create_time)

SELECT
  "createdAt" AS "time",
  CAST(value AS DECIMAL ) AS "items"
FROM "Snapshots"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("createdAt") AND
  key = 'MARKETPLACE_LISTING_ITEMS'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "createdAt" AS "time",
  CAST(value AS DECIMAL ) AS "users"
FROM "Snapshots"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("createdAt") AND
  key = 'MARKETPLACE_TOTAL_USER'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "createdAt" AS "time",
  CAST(value AS DECIMAL ) AS "volume"
FROM "Snapshots"
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("createdAt") AND
  key = 'MARKETPLACE_LISTING_VOLUME'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT "value"
FROM "Snapshots" where key = 'SYSTEM_CONFIG_KEY'
